Created an attachment (id=14946)
Perspective without annotations

I do not get any errors when I do this. However, the file in question is 
marked as binary so the annotate fails (i.e. returns no contents). I have 
added a prompt that warns the ser that the file is binary and uses a force 
flag (-F) if the user chooses to continue. The result isn't any more usable as 
the entire file will appear as belonging to a single revision but htis is 
better than an empty editor.
